lines.text: Never try to fool children. They expect nothing and therefore see everything.
I don't know which frightens me more, that the children are lying or that they are telling the truth.
Frances, I've been down the beck a hundred times. Why haven't I ever seen any of them?
Grownups don't know how to believe.
Anything can be faked by anyone.

The girls will be herding the fairies back this way. I'm certain both girls are clairvoyant, and perhaps mediums as well. Together, they create an etheric field which allows the fairies to metabolize subtle amounts of ectoplasm into their bodies. That's how they're able to capture them on film. Do you see? No. Well, uhm... Well I don't expect you to understand.
I think I know what it means when they say that my Daddy's missing.
It means they don't know where he is.
no trickery was used in my dark room, and there are no fairies living at the bottom of my garden.
Is it true all Africans are cannibals?
I've never met one. Do you have anymore stupid questions?
